name: TOUNY ADVENTURE
description:
Chapter 1 :

It's an adventure game, where you play as a French youtuber! A rebellion in the Youbute kingdom has taken place due to monetization problems! But the king Goolge contaminated the civilians to kill them. You are the last survivor and you must save humanity!

minimal :
  • Intel core i5 or AMD A8 (3.0 Ghz)
  • Intel HD graphique or Radeon HD (750Mo)
  • 8go RAM
  • 1 go Memory .
Best :
  • Intel core i5 or AMD A10 (3.5 Ghz)
  • Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or Radeon R7 250 (2 Go)
  • 16go RAM
  • 1 go Memory.
BUTTONFUNCTIONW A S D (or Z Q S D)MoveMouseLookLeft clickshoot (or nothing)ShiftRunspacejump

( You can change this in the unity start menu )
